message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both enjoy the money.
Alice, that's not a reasonable starting point. I'm proposing a more equitable split. Let's be fair and avoid this thing dragging out.
Bob, my friend, let's not waste time.  This offer still benefits you greatly. Time is literally money for me, you know?
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm lowering my ask to show I'm willing to negotiate, but this needs to be a fair deal.
Bob, I'm sensing you're a man who appreciates a good deal. This is as good as it gets. Don't let time erode its value!
Alice, it's clear you're feeling the pressure of time. I'm dropping my offer again, but I won't go any lower. Let's end this now and both walk away with something substantial.
Okay Bob, you drive a hard bargain, but time waits for no one. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
Alice, you're right, time is precious. I'm sticking to my guns on this split, it's more than fair.  Let's wrap this up and both call it a win.
